amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an additional 34,000 Section 8 vouchers, with 10,000 reserved for disabled families; and add almost $5 million to veterans' extended care facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $195 million the bill's appropriation for Section 8 assistance for the purpose of providing an additional 34,000 new incremental vouchers. The amendment also increases the bill's appropriation for VA grants to states by $5 million for the construction of extended-care facilities. Both increases are accomplished by offsets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 284 (Roll no. 282).
